c74object.name: hoa.plug~
c74object.digest: A partcher that duplicates patcher for hoa processing.
c74object.description:
hoa.plug~
helps the modularization of patches for ambisonic process. Number of inlets and outlets depends on number of inlets and outlets objects within its subpatch window, ambisonic order and 1st argument. Second argument is the name of the patcher to load and 3rd argument is the mode pre, no or post encoding.

metadatalist.metadata: HoaLibrary by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

objarg.name: patcher-name
objarg.digest: The name of the patcher to load into.
objarg.description: The name of the patcher to load into (must be in your search paths)

objarg.name: mode
objarg.digest: Mode (pre, no, post encoding or out).
objarg.description: - No mode for no encoding processing, useful to create diffused soundfields. - Pre mode for processing on order's signals. - Post mode for processing on harmonics signals. - Out mode is under construction please be patient...
